descriptions: ["DescriptionFeaturing private gated entrance and driveway, breathtaking entrance with a stunning chandelier dropping through three floors, this unique villa's floor plan has been well thought out. It is perfectly positioned to take full advantage of the natural light throughout the whole home Also, all rooms benefit from full Marina Views. The home comes with stunning upgrades throughout using only the finest European materials, including a fully fitted white gloss German kitchen with integrated Miele appliances. Also on offer are double height ceilings and a large decked terrace with private swimming pool/ Trendy Rustic BBQ lounge. A spiral staircase leads you to the first level. The long landing leads to 2 bright bedrooms, en-suite bathrooms and private balconies overlooking the Marina. There are a further 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms on the second floor. The Jewels development is well located, just a few minutes walk from the beach, train and shopping mall as well as the brand new Bluewaters Island including endless amenities such as restaurants and bars, not forgetting the beaches and JBR walk.  You will have access to shared gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, but the villa has its own swimming pool which you can enjoy privately. The place has a private pool , with terraces and beautiful canal views with boat cuisine, also with very friendly housemaid lives separately outside the villa and will help you with all your needs 24 hours. The villa has a private parking."]

Manchester Tower is a mid-end, 31-storey building in Dubai Marina that was launched in 2004 and completed in 2007. The tower is located close to the Trident Waterfront, Escan Tower, Marina Park, and Marina Pearl buildings.
This building is considered to be the most affordable building in Dubai Marina and has quick access back onto Sheikh Zayed Road.
Call or send us Whatsapp +971547807478 or +97144542751 for details!
Dubai Marina is a district in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Dubai Marina is an artificial canal city, built along a two-mile (3 km) stretch of Persian Gulf shoreline. 
It is located on Interchange 5 between Jebel Ali Port and the area which hosts Dubai Internet City, Dubai Media City, and the American University in Dubai. Dubai Marina was inspired by the Concord Pacific Place development along False Creek in Vancouver, BC, Canada.
